metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48197 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) exists in the TreeView of YUI2 through 2800: up.php sam.php renderhidden.php removechildren.php removeall.php readd.php overflow.php newnode2.php newnode.php. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

notes.Note: jdstrand> maas uses an embedded copy of yui 3.4.1 in 12.04 and portions of yui3 in 12.10 and higher mdeslaur> yui3 doesn't contain the treeview directory, so it doesn't appear vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: yui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
